messages.title: A stronger economy
messages.content: Tony will continue to work alongside local businesses to help create skilled jobs across West Shoebury.

messages.title: Campaigning to improve Newcastle town centre
messages.content: Tony is campaigning for a better Newcastle for all residents.

messages.title: A better, more secure future
messages.content: Tony wants to ensure that your family and our country have a secure and prosperous future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tony Cox fights to save Newcastle's green spaces from inappropriate development.
Tony supports welfare reforms to reward work and protect the vulnerable.
Tony believes that you, the British people, should be given the final say on our future relationships with Europe.

issues.brexitEurope: Tony believes that you, the British people, should be given the final say on our future relationships with Europe.
